mapper.sql:
FROM store s WHERE 1=1 AND ifstDelNy = #{shDelNy} AND ifstCreatedAt between #{shDateStart} and #{shDateEnd}
AND ifstName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND ifstPhone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND ifstAddress LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select: select s.ifstSeq ,s.ifstName ,s.ifstAddress ,up.path ,up.uuidName from store s left join storeUploaded up on up.pseq = s.ifstSeq where 1=1 AND s.ifstDelNy = 0 AND s.ifstName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') ORDER BY s.ifstCreatedAt DESC

select s.ifstSeq ,s.ifstName ,s.ifstPhone ,s.ifstZipCode ,s.ifstAddress ,s.ifstAddressDetail ,s.ifstAddressExtra ,s.ifstInfo ,s.ifstDirections ,s.ifstOrderNy ,s.ifstCreatedAt from store s where 1=1 and s.ifstDelNy = 0 AND ifstName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') ORDER BY s.ifstCreatedAt DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) from store s where 1=1 AND ifstName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')

select s.ifstSeq ,s.ifstName ,s.ifstPhone ,s.ifstZipCode ,s.ifstAddress ,s.ifstAddressDetail ,s.ifstAddressExtra ,s.ifstInfo ,s.ifstDirections ,s.ifstOrderNy ,s.ifstDelNy ,s.ifstCreatedAt
ORDER BY s.ifstSeq DESC

select s.ifstSeq ,s.ifstName ,s.ifstPhone ,s.ifstZipCode ,s.ifstAddress ,s.ifstAddressDetail ,s.ifstAddressExtra ,s.ifstInfo ,s.ifstDirections ,s.ifstOrderNy from store s where 1=1 and s.ifstSeq = #{ifstSeq}
select s.* from store s where 1=1 and s.ifstSeq = #{ifstSeq}

select m.ifmnName ,m.ifmnSeq ,m.ifmnPrice ,up.path ,up.uuidName ,up.pseq from menu m left join menuUploaded up on up.pseq = m.ifmnSeq left join store s on s.ifstSeq = m.ifstSeq where 1=1 and m.ifstSeq = #{ifstSeq}
) aa limit 4 offset 0
select rt.ifrtDay ,rt.ifrtStartTime ,rt.ifrtEndTime ,rt.ifrtOpening ,rt.ifstSeq from runningTime rt where 1=1 and rt.ifstSeq = #{ifstSeq}
select rt.ifrtDay ,rt.ifrtOpening from runningTime rt group by ifrtDay
select rt.ifrtDay ,rt.ifrtOpening from runningTime rt group by ifrtOpening
mapper.update: UPDATE store SET ifstDelNy = 1 where 1=1 and ifstSeq = #{ifstSeq}
